archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Diary, 1977-1979 of Jack D'Ambrosio, a pharmacist of Englewood, Ohio. Entries are made several times a week and are very detailed. Recorded are weather, family life, health, work, social life, and the occasional comment on politics.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jack D'Ambrosio Diary, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 01/11/2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in January 2010 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki:http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Jack_D%27Ambrosio.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Diary, 1977-1979 of Jack D'Ambrosio, a pharmacist of Englewood, Ohio. Entries are made several times a week and are very detailed. Recorded are weather, family life, health, work, social life, and the occasional comment on politics.
